heading: Summary
textarea: Because of the prevalence of social media, location-based mobile applications, and e-commerce, customersâ€™ digital footprints offer a more complete picture of their habits than might otherwise be available to advertisers. Advertisers can collect or purchase highly detailed information about buyers, and advertising strategies can be precisely targeted to potential buyers. As part of an industry that uses large quantities of data about private citizens, advertising and marketing entities must balance the potential benefits of targeted advertising with protecting customer data and privacy.
